sources.name: employees
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  employees

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared employees = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://rawblobstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/dtcc/rawdata/employees.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = employees,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each ([Quarter of Joining] = "Q2" or [Quarter of Joining] = "Q4"))
in
  #"Filtered rows";
